Posts.Content: Hi samba, sorry to hear about what your going through I was diagnosed last may I stopped smoking using the mints I have stopped now for 3 years I found you have to really want to stop I tried many times before I actually did stop when you are ready you will stop I promise you it wasn't as hard as what I thought it would be good luck with everything also don't be to hard on yourself if you fail when your ready you will do it xx
Posts.Title: BC and smoking

Posts.Content: Thank you ladies for your reply i have decided to have the test because i have a daughter and i am doing it for her my mum died at 32, my nan at 32 ,my aunt at 55 ,and now i have bc ,if i never had my girl i honestly dont think i would have it ...thats just me... i will have my treatment and then will speak to the nurse at the end of june,there is just sooo much to take in at the moment its hard phew .. i feel like my whole life has been turned upside down this site has gave me inspiration there are so many brave strong people out there its good to be able to talk and ask people questions who have and are going through this awful disease blessings all thank you for your replies xx
Posts.Title: genetic testing

Posts.Content: Hello i was wondering if any one has had the genetic test for bc i have been offered it .. i havent really spoke to much about it with my bc nurse as i have just been diagnosed about a month ago so its very early days for me at the moment and i am just takeing one day at a time i was just wondering what happens and how long it takes etc she has said i will need to talk to someone before i have it any info will be good thank you xx
Posts.Title: genetic testing

Posts.Content: thanks for the info ruthy good luck with the treatment i am going to have the test like you said its for the future generation ..thats my main concern
Posts.Title: genetic testing

Posts.Content: Thank you lulu for the info i have a few months to think about it once again ty for the info xx
Posts.Title: genetic testing

Posts.Content: Thinking of you today sasha xx
Posts.Title: Deja vu ????

Posts.Content: Hi Abbey, just wanted to say hi and you will recieve a lot of support from these lovely ladies as i have i like your strength and positivity keep it up big hugs xxx
Posts.Title: Hi I'm new here...

Posts.Content: Hello Tracey, i am so sorry to hear your news stay strong and you can beat this bloody awful disease my thoughts are with you and all the ladies are really supportive here lots of love and big hugs trisha xx
Posts.Title: Diagnosed with breast cancer for a second time in opposite breast

Posts.Content: hello ladies, i have started tamoxifan a week ago and now i am suffering really bad with itchy skin my whole body feels like it has things crawling all over it especially my hands and neck .. has anyone else had these experiences i cant stand it i dont know what to do any help would be appreciated thanks.
Posts.Title: itchy skin

Posts.Content: Thank You for your replys and yes it was a allergic reaction to the tablets i started to feel very unwell and my gp told me to stop them straight away i have rang my bc nurse and back to see the oncologist on thursday to start something else ..i feel really scared to try other drugs cos this reaction was awfull i dont want to go through it again.
Posts.Title: itchy skin

Posts.Content: Thank you for your positive words it has lifted my mood i was and still am feeling pretty bloody rotten but it has only been 24 hours since the reaction but thanks again for making me feel better hope you are ok ..
Posts.Title: itchy skin

Posts.Content: Good luck for tomorrow fingers and toes crossed for you xx
Posts.Title: its spread so scared

Posts.Content: My side affects we're itching from head to toe and my whole body felt alive sickness and was admitted for blood clot on lung was breathless etc there were a few more , I don't want to say tamoxifan is not good in any way because it is saving lives and to be honest if I had just a few side affects I would have persevered with it we all all different I am concerned about not taking anything because I am still having monthly periods and I was e/ r and p/r positive Jenny have a chat with your oncologist or Bcn but if you can preserve with it you know your protected .. It turned out I didn't have a lung problem from it take care xx
Posts.Title: Tamoxifin

Posts.Content: Hi amanda, I had the same problem was on tamoxifen only for a week had to go in hospital had a severe allergic reaction then was given zoladex injections and armidex tablets was taken of them to my oncologist said they were only protecting me by 1% so he said did I want to stop I did everyone is different with meds side affects I feel much better in myself I am sure they wouldn't take people of meds if they thought they needed them I hop that makes sense I do still worry and get a bit frightened in case it comes back but then I think everyone has them fears take care xx
Posts.Title: Tamoxifin

Posts.Content: Hi ya Jenny, have you tried talking to your bcn about your concerns I would also its your body and only you knows what's happening to it or maybe if you feel so bad get a second opinion I saw to oncologists and was told two different things I was a bit confused go with what your feeling and let them know hope all goes ok with the neurologist stay strong Jenny xx
Posts.Title: Tamoxifin

Posts.Content: Hi Jenny I am in waltham abbey, and to be honest i have stayed on this site for 9 months now I find all the ladies such a support and I guess we kind of all know what each other is going through in a way there such a great bunch of strong women .. When I first got diagnosed 9 months ago I didn't click with my bcn then I saw another one and we just kind of clicked felt more comfy maybe see if you can see another one xx
Posts.Title: Tamoxifin

Posts.Content: hi amanda, i was diagnosed with bc this month april, i have had my wle and a snb i am still sore and i think like everyone else here in shock i managed to get the first few weeks of being in denial but its now hit me like a ton of bricks i get my results on treatment on the 3rd may so not long to wait now ... i like this site all seems very supportive to each other we will have good days and some bad days but we are here even tho we have the c word i know how you feel about telling your family and friends its not easy i feel like i am moaning too when i talk to hubby about things i am sending you a big hug lots of love trisha xxx
Posts.Title: Scared!!

Posts.Content: Thanks amanda, i know what your saying about talking and wondering about things and family hospitals treatments it feels like its never ending and its just the start but what can we all do but walk the path one day at a time .... got the hug thank you and will chat really soon lots of love xx big hugs xx
Posts.Title: Scared!!

Posts.Content: Hello ladies I always read the responses on here and I think a lot of us were diagnosed around the same time April 2012 I remember Annie's chats etc and its so beautiful and comforting to read what each one has said it brings such a lump to my throat and tear to my eyes that we don't know each other personally but once again it feels like we do if that makes sense ... Sometimes I wonder were I would be without all you lovelies love to you all Annie is always in my thoughts xxx
Posts.Title: Feels empty here
